scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: @powershell copy src/data/data.xlsx dist/data.xlsx && @powershell Copy-Item -Path src/img -Destination dist -Recurse -Force
scripts.package: npm run package:win && npm run package:macos && npm run package:linux
scripts.package:win: @powershell Compress-Archive -Path dist/quiz-app-win.exe, dist/data.xlsx, dist/.env, dist/img -DestinationPath dist/release/quiz-app-win.zip -Update
scripts.package:linux: @powershell Compress-Archive -Path dist/quiz-app-linux, dist/data.xlsx, dist/.env, dist/img -DestinationPath dist/release/quiz-app-linux.zip -Update
scripts.package:macos: @powershell Compress-Archive -Path dist/quiz-app-macos, dist/data.xlsx, dist/.env, dist/img -DestinationPath dist/release/quiz-app-macos.zip -Update
scripts.build-package: npm run build && npm run package
